paper_abstract: In this paper, a robust phase watermarking algorithm for still images is presented where the watermark information is conveyed in the phase spectrum in the transform domain. Phase watermarking algorithm that uses multi-polarity Walsh-Hadamard and Complex Hadamard transform is developed. The robustness of presented algorithm is investigated by its uniqueness, JPEG encoding, image resizing, dithering noise distortions, sharpening, cropping and successive watermarking.
paper_title: Phase watermarking algorithm using hybrid multi-polarity Hadamard transform
